card.title: Restore Progress
card.text: I have found your previous saved progress.

voice.intro: I have found your previous saved progress.
voice.prompt: To continue from where you left off, say "Resume Skill". Otherwise, say "Reset Skill".

voice.intro: My apologies, please repeat your command.

card.title: Help
card.text:
At any time you can say "repeat options." To hear the entire scene again, say "repeat scene." In order to revisit the previous scene, say "go back." To skip past the current scene description, say "skip.", or say "start again." At any time, to hear these commands again, say "help".  Exploring the Design Thinking process means listening to important questions and considering 6 steps.  
These steps are: to empathize, to define, to ideate, to prototype, to collect feedback, and to reflect.  
You will immerse yourself in each step of the process at a time.  You can always say "start again" to return here.  It is also ok to say "exit skill".  You can interrupt me at any time and move to a specific step by saying "Alexa, step 2." We will save your progress and give you time to meditate or take notes.

voice.intro: I understand you need some help. At any time you can issue the following commands. To hear your options again, say "repeat options." To hear the entire scene again, say "repeat scene." In order to revisit the previous scene, say "go back." To skip past the current scene description, say "skip." To start the game over, say "start again." At any time, to hear these commands again, say "help".
voice.prompt: Now, what would you like to do?

card.title: Good bye
card.text: Thank you for using My Alexa Skill.

voice.intro: Thank you for using My Alexa Skill.
